TypeSignature.Value: .class nested protected auto ansi beforefieldinit WeakEventManager/ListenerList extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供用于存储 的侦听器的内置集合列表。

span.span: Provides a built-in collection list for storing listeners for a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 虽然此列表包含的成员与 和 定义的成员类似，但提供了类似的功能，但此类不实现这两个接口。Although this list contains members that resemble those defined by and , and provide similar functionality, this class implements neither of those interfaces. 大多数 派生类不需要使用 上的任何成员。Most derived classes do not need to use any members on . 和 的 方法在内部使用默认 ，其中一个列表用于每个 `source`。The methods and use a default internally, one list for each `source`. 如果 类维护同一事件源组合的多个列表，则只需调用 方法，其中每个列表都是为事件的不同条件而创建的。You only need to call methods if your class maintains multiple lists for the same event-source combination, with each list created to account for different conditions of the event. 在这种情况下，你不会使用 和 ，而只是实现 `AddListener` 或 `RemoveListener`，以便只在一个内部侦听器列表中操作侦听器，通常基于你添加到 `AddListener` 或 `RemoveListener`的参数。In this case, you would not use and and would instead implement `AddListener` or `RemoveListener` to act upon listeners in just one of the internal listener lists, typically based on a parameter that you add to `AddListener` or `RemoveListener`. 另外，接收原始事件的处理程序实现不能简单地调用 ;您必须跟踪事件的细节，并使用 仅将事件传送到适当的列表。Also, the handler implementation that receives the raw event cannot simply call ; you must instead keep track of the specifics of the event and deliver the event only to the appropriate list using . 提供各种 方法，以便您可以使用您的内部列表，以便您可以在实际传递事件期间阻止修改列表。The various methods of are provided so that you can work with your internal lists and so that you can prevent modification of the list during actual delivery of the event. 使用此实现技术的示例类是 的，它根据所更改的属性，维护 `PropertyChanged` 的单独侦听器列表。An example class that used this implementation technique is , which maintains separate listener lists for `PropertyChanged` based on which property changed. ## XAML 文本用法XAML Text Usage 不能在 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]中使用此类。You cannot use this class in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].

param.name: listener
param.span: 要添加到 的侦听器元素。

span.span: The listener element to add to the .

summary.span: 将 对象添加到 中。

span.span: Adds a object to the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 作为侦听器提供的对象应为实现 接口并因此具有工作 实现的 。The object provided as listener should be a that implements the interface and therefore has a working implementation. 在更改列表内容之前，应始终调用 。You should always call before changing the list contents. 否则，列表可能正在传递事件，因此原始被锁定。Otherwise, the list may be in process of delivering events and therefore the original is locked. 调用 会将输入 `list` 更改为克隆，以便您的 调用仍可在克隆上工作。Calling changes the input `list` to be a clone so that your call can still work on the clone. 如果 返回 `true`，则可能需要更新对在代码的其他区域中维护的列表的所有私有引用。If returns `true`, you might need to update any private references to the list that you maintain in other areas of your code.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool BeginUse() cil managed

summary.span: 声明列表正在使用中。

span.span: Declares the list to be in use.

summary.span: 这可以防止在列表项迭代过程中直接更改列表。

span.span: This prevents direct changes to the list during iterations of the list items.

returns.span: 如果列表已经声明为正在使用中，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the list was already declared to be in use; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现应在遍历列表之前调用 ，以将事件传递给侦听器，并应在完成操作时调用 。A implementation should call before iterating through the list to deliver an event to the listeners, and should call when it is done. 这可防止其他调用方修改列表，同时用于事件传递的迭代正在进行。This prevents another caller from modifying the list while the iteration for purposes of event delivery is in progress. 如果在此时间段内修改了列表，则会克隆列表。If the list is modified during this time, then the list is cloned. 如果克隆了列表，则 返回 `true`，这意味着在上一次传递中，你已错过最近的侦听器更改。If the list is cloned, then returns `true`, which means that you have missed a recent listener change in the last delivery.

span.span: if the list is empty; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法等效于检查 是否为零，且不检查列表中是否有任何引用现已过时。This method is equivalent to checking whether the is zero, and does not check whether any of the references in the list are now stale. 如果要确保所有引用仍有效，请在检查列表的空状态之前调用 。If you want to assure that all references are still valid, call just prior to checking the empty status of the list.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig bool PrepareForWriting(class System.Windows.WeakEventManager/ListenerList& list) cil managed
Public Shared Function PrepareForWriting (ByRef list As WeakEventManager.ListenerList) As Boolean

param.name: list
param.span: 要检查其使用状态和可能副本的列表。

span.span: The list to check for use state and potentially copy.

summary.span: 检查是否正在使用提供的列表，如果正在使用，则将列表引用参数设置为该列表的副本，而不是原稿列表的副本。

span.span: Checks to see whether the provided list is in use, and if so, sets the list reference parameter to a copy of that list rather than the original.

returns.span: 如果调用时正在使用提供的列表，并因此 参数引用被重置为副本，则为 。

span.span: if the provided list was in use at the time of call and therefore the parameter reference was reset to be a copy.

returns.span: 如果未使用提供的列表，在此情况下 参数引用保持不变，则为 。

span.span: if the provided list was not in use, in which case the parameter reference remains unaltered.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果正在使用给定的列表（这意味着当前正在传递事件），调用此方法会将输入 `list` 替换为克隆。If the given list is in use (which means an event is currently being delivered), calling this method will replace the input `list` with a clone. 现有用户会完成将事件传递到原始列表的操作，而不会干扰新列表的更改。The existing users will finish delivering the event to the original list, without interference from changes to the new list. 如果该方法返回 `true`，则调用方可能需要在其自己的数据结构中插入新列表，因为这指示提供的列表不再是最新的可能性。If the method returns `true`, callers may want to insert the new list in their own data structures, since this indicates the possibility that the provided list is no longer current. 此方法在内部调用 ，然后立即调用 。This method calls internally and then immediately calls . 因此，调用 本身并不会对列表引入锁。Therefore calling does not itself introduce a lock on the list. 在调用 后，甚至克隆副本都作为辅助操作完成。Even the clone copy is done as a secondary operation after calling .

span.span: Removes the first occurrence of a listener item from the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在更改列表内容之前，应始终调用 。You should always call before changing the list contents. 否则，列表可能正在传递事件，因此原始被锁定。Otherwise, the list may be in process of delivering events and therefore the original is locked. 调用 会将输入 `list` 更改为克隆，以便您的 调用仍可在克隆上工作。Calling changes the input `list` to be a clone so that your call can still work on the clone. 如果 返回 `true`，则可能需要更新对在代码的其他区域中维护的列表的所有私有引用。If returns `true`, you might need to update any private references to the list that you maintain in other areas of your code.
